channel.title: Would this code work?
channel.description:
Okay on my server there's a bunch of fags who somehow get their character look as -300 or -120 when the regular settings are suppose to be from 0 to... 50. This is a regular character's looks:
[LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 0 character-look = 2 18 character-look = 3 26 character-look = 4 33 character-look = 5 36 character-look = 6 42 character-look = 7 10 character-look = 8 0 character-look = 9 0 character-look = 10 0 character-look = 11 0 character-look = 12 0
This is someone who has a nulled character's looks (which causes everybody in that player's radius to freeze):
[LOOK] character-look = 0 13 character-look = 1 0 character-look = 2 0 character-look = 3 82 character-look = 4 30 character-look = 5 113 character-look = 6 -82 character-look = 7 -12 character-look = 8 0 character-look = 9 0 character-look = 10 0 character-look = 11 0 character-look = 12 -34
Still having this problem, feel free to help or if your a mod for some reason looking at this, just remove it.

item.title: Would this code work?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Okay on my server there’s a bunch of fags who somehow get their character look as -300 or -120 when the regular settings are suppose to be from 0 to… 50.
This is a regular character’s looks:

[LOOK]
character-look = 0 0
character-look = 1 0
character-look = 2 18
character-look = 3 26
character-look = 4 33
character-look = 5 36
character-look = 6 42
character-look = 7 10
character-look = 8 0
character-look = 9 0
character-look = 10 0
character-look = 11 0
character-look = 12 0

This is someone who has a nulled character’s looks (which causes everybody in that player’s radius to freeze):

[LOOK]
character-look = 0 13
character-look = 1 0
character-look = 2 0
character-look = 3 82
character-look = 4 30
character-look = 5 113
character-look = 6 -82
character-look = 7 -12
character-look = 8 0
character-look = 9 0
character-look = 10 0
character-look = 11 0
character-look = 12 -34

Still having this problem, feel free to help or if your a mod for some reason looking at this, just remove it.
